entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 07:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
